verses.verse: In the year <WH8141> that Tartan <WH8661> came <WH935> to Ashdod, <WH795> (when Sargon <WH5623> the king <WH4428> of Assyria <WH804> sent <WH7971> him,) and fought <WH3898> against Ashdod, <WH795> and took <WH3920> it;

At the same <WH1931> time <WH6256> spoke <WH1696> the LORD <WH3068> by Isaiah <WH3470> the son <WH1121> of Amoz, <WH531> saying, <WH559> Go <WH3212> and loose <WH6605> the sackcloth <WH8242> from off <WH5921> your loins, <WH4975> and put <WH2502> off your shoe <WH5275> from your foot. <WH7272> And he did <WH6213> so, <WH3651> walking <WH1980> naked <WH6174> and barefoot. <WH3182>

And the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> Like as my servant <WH5650> Isaiah <WH3470> has walked <WH1980> naked <WH6174> and barefoot <WH3182> three <WH7969> years <WH8141> for a sign <WH226> and wonder <WH4159> on Egypt <WH4714> and on Ethiopia; <WH3568>

So <WH3651> shall the king <WH4428> of Assyria <WH804> lead <WH5090> away the Egyptians <WH4714> prisoners, <WH7628> and the Ethiopians <WH3569> captives, <WH1546> young <WH5288> and old, <WH2205> naked <WH6174> and barefoot, <WH3182> even with their buttocks <WH8357> uncovered, <WH2834> to the shame <WH6172> of Egypt. <WH4714>
And they shall be afraid <WH2865> and ashamed <WH954> of Ethiopia <WH3568> their expectation, <WH4007> and of Egypt <WH4714> their glory. <WH8597>

And the inhabitant <WH3427> of this <WH2088> isle <WH339> shall say <WH559> in that day, <WH3117> Behold, <WH2009> such <WH3541> is our expectation, <WH4007> where <WH834> <WH8033> we flee <WH5127> for help <WH5833> to be delivered <WH5337> from the king <WH4428> of Assyria: <WH804> and how <WH349> shall we escape? <WH4422>
